summary:
Injector setting makes visual darker and little bit sharper. 
- No FPS drops!
- No colour changes!
descriptionHtml:
[size=130][b]DARKER Nights and Environment[/b][/size]
ver. 1.0

[b]DESCRIPTION:[/b]
- Injector setting (included in archive) makes visual darker and little bit sharper. 
- No FPS drops!
- No colour changes!
- Look at gallery at many comparative ingame screenshots.

[b]INSTALL:[/b]
- Extract rar archive to main game folder (where is the file TESV.exe)
- Make sure that game setting have brightness to 0 (ingame settings slider in middle; or fGamma=1.0000 in SkyrimPrefs.ini).
- Press \"Pause\" in game to turn effect off.

[b]ENJOY![/b]
author: Say
